#Instructions on how to install bob-the-builder using the released jars

= Install steps =
  # Download the [http://code.google.com/a/eclipselabs.org/p/bob-the-builder/downloads/list latest released jar].
  # `cp BobTheBuilder-x.y.z.snapshot.jar <your-eclipse-installation>/dropins/`
  # restart eclipse and load a Java file in your editor
    * [www.myeclipseide.com/ MyEclipse] users should see a notification window about the detection of the plugin in the `dropins` folder
  # A new context menu labeled `Bob The Builder` should show up between `Run` and `Window` menus
